briefTitle: Knowledge and Attitudes Regarding Healthy Lifestyle and Health Behavior Change in Cancer Patients and Their Partners; A Pilot Study
officialTitle: Knowledge and Attitudes Regarding Healthy Lifestyle and Health Behavior Change in Cancer Patients and Their Partners
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Gain insight into barriers and facilitators for health behavior change
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* between 18 and 65 years of age
* have completed adjuvant or curative chemotherapy (in BC and TC patients, respectively) or started adjuvant hormonal therapy alone (in BC patients) between 6 and 24 months previously
* have no signs or symptoms of recurrent disease
* be in follow-up at the Department of Medical Oncology of the UMCG.

Exclusion Criteria:

* signs or symptoms of recurrent disease
* mental disability
